bug_report.summary: When clicking on the 'A to Z' filtering button on the main page of the application, chaotic filtering of lists occurs
step_to_reproduce: 2. Create 15 lists that will start accordingly (A, a, D, 3, :, U, u, Ш, ш, 5, @, Ї, ї, -, d)
3. On the main page of the application, click on the filter button 'A to Z'
expected_result: The lists are sorted in order: symbols, numbers, Latin letters (upper case first), Cyrillic letters (upper case first)
Correct order : (-, :, @, 3, 5, А, а, D, d, U, u, Ї, ї, Ш, ш)
bug_report.author: Vitaly
